subject: How to get free quality visitors to your website
body:
Hi





This brand new advertising tool has never been usedbefore and it's very hot! - I released it to the public this month!

Within 15 minutes you will have your own website traffic generator that will bringin an ever increasing amount of hits to your websites! Automatically
For full information please download the attached .html file
